remarks: The projective map of the join of two lattice elements.  Part of Equation 15.5.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 63.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2012.)
statement:
pmapjoin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapjoin.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pmapjoin.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapjoin.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmapjoin $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) .+ ( M ` Y ) ) C_ ( M ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
